title: Asbjørns Julekalender
overview: There are few people who love Christmas as much as Asbjørn Brekke, and that's why TVNorge has hires him to create his own Christmas calendar! The channel has promised him 24 celebrity surprise guests, so every night in advent a hopeful Asbjørn Brekke will open the door to his Christmas workshop for a new potention friend.
